T04sanss01u:3: yasyâśraveṇa narakâdi mahāprapātadāhâdiduṣkham anubhūtam abhūd bhavadbhiḥ |
T04sanss01u:4: tīvraṃ punaḥ punar anantam aśāntacittais tac chrotum ādaram udārataraṃ bhajadhvam ||
T04sanss01u:5: śrutvā ... pāpaṃ anuddhatâtmā pūrvârjitaṃ ca vipulaṃ kṣapayaty aśeṣam |
T04sanss01u:6: aprāptapūrvam api saukhyam avāpnuvanti hāniṃ sukhāc ca na kadācid api prayānti ||
T04sanss01u:7: sambodhisatvasukham uttamam akṣaya ... apy asamasaṃpadam āpnuvanti |
T04sanss01u:8: tad dharmaratnam atidurlabham apy alabdhaṃ labdhakṣaṇāḥ śṛṇvata sâdaram ucyamānam ||
T04sanss01u:9: āyāntu ca tribhuvanâikahitasya vākyaṃ śrotuṃ prasannamanasaḥ suranāgasatvāḥ |
T04sanss01u:11: sugatān sasutān sadharmakāyān praṇipatyâdarato 'khilāṃś ca vandyān |
T04sanss01u:13: na ca kiñcid apūrvam atra vācyaṃ na ca saṃgranthanakauśalaṃ mamâsti |
T04sanss01u:14: atâiva na me parârthayatnaḥ svamano bhāvayituṃ mamêdam iṣṭam ||
T04sanss01u:15: mama tāvad anena yāti vṛddhiṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ prasādavegaḥ |
T04sanss01u:16: yadi matsamadhātur eva paśyed aparo 'py enam ato 'pi sârthako 'yam ||
T04sanss01u:21: ntyate hitaṃ punar apy eṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ ||
T04sanss01u:24: durlabhâṣṭākṣaṇanirvṛttir durlabho manuṣyapratilambho durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpatviśuddhir durlabho buddhôtpādo |
T04sanss01u:31: durlabhaḥ saddharme tadanukūlaḥ prayatno manuṣyalokae iti ||
T04sanss01u:34: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca na priyaṃ |
T04sanss01u:35: tadâtmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yat taṃ rakṣāmi nêtaram |
T04sanss01u:38: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhau kāryā matir dṛḍhā ||
T04sanss01u:40: śraddhayamānu jinān jinadharmmān śraddhayate cari buddhasutānām |
T04sanss01u:41: bodhi anuttara śraddhayamāno jāyati cittaṃ mahāpuruṣāṇām ||
T04sanss01u:49: śraddha nidhānadhanaṃ caraṇâgraṃ pāṇi yathā śubhasaṃgrahamūlam ||
T04sanss01u:66: te tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajanti |
T04sanss01u:67: ye tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajantī |
T04sanss01u:89: ye sadâdhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhis teṣûpapadyati bodhayi cittam |
T04sanss01u:97: ye sada pāramitāsu carantī te pratipannêho mahayāne |
T04sanss01u:98: ye pratipannêho mahayāne te pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān ||
T04sanss01u:99: ye pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān teṣu anusmṛti buddhâbhedyā |
T04sanss01u:103: teṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ ||
T04sanss01u:104: yeṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ teṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmmaḥ |
T04sanss01u:106: yeṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmaḥ te sada dhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhir |
T04sanss01u:113: ye tu śubhôpacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyās te imi śraddadhi hetubalena ||
T04sanss01u:115: nôta tu tādṛśu puṇyaviśeṣo yādṛśa śraddadhato imi dharmmān ||
T04sanss01u:118: śraddhā hi paramaṃ yānaṃ yena niryānti nāyakāḥ |
T04sanss01u:120: aśrāddhasya manuṣyasya śuklo dharmo na rohati |
T04sanss01u:124: śraddhāyām ānanda yogaḥ karaṇīyêdaṃ tathāgato vijñapayatîti ||
T04sanss01u:129: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kartavyaṃ sarvapuṇyasaṃgrahatvāt tad yathâryasiṃhaparipṛcchāyāṃ
T04sanss01u:138: eṣa saṃgraha dharmāṇāṃ bhavate tena ca priyaḥ ||
T04sanss01u:158: iti hi kulaputra bodhicittam ebhiś cânyaiś câpramāṇair guṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgatam iti ||
T04sanss01u:174: asaṃbhinnâtmadṛṣṭir aniṣkrāntas traidhātukād buddharutam eva muñcati |
T04sanss01u:177: jayamateś ca bodhisatvasya pṛthivī vidāram adāt |
T04sanss01u:179: sa hi śūnyatāṃ nâdhimuktavān śūnyatāvādini ca pratighaṃ kṛtavān ||
T04sanss01u:184: kaścit puruṣaḥ pañcabuddhakṣetraparamâṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn abhikramitukāmaḥ syāt |
T04sanss01u:185: sa paśuratham abhiruhya mārgaṃ pratipadyate sa cireṇa dīrgheṇâdhvanā yojanaśataṃ gacchet |
T04sanss01u:186: sa tatra mahatyā vātamaṇḍalyā paścāt khalu pu-
T04sanss01u:189: tat kiṃ śaknuyāt sa puruṣas tān lokadhātūn paśurathenâtikramitum |
T04sanss01u:190: yāvad anabhilāpyânabhilāpyair api kalpair ekam api lokadhātum atikramitum |
T04sanss01u:194: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ yaḥ kaścid bodhicittam utpādya mahāyānaṃ |
T04sanss01u:199: śrāvakayānaṃ ca paṭhati svâdhyāyati mīmāṃsate paribudhyate 'rthāṃś ca pāṭhayati yāvad bodhayati
T04sanss01u:202: yad api tasya bodhisatvasya bodhibhāvanâtaḥ prajñêndriyaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ tad api tasya dhanvīkriyate pratihanyate |
T04sanss01u:204: tad evam eṣā śūnyatânadhimuktir mahāyānânabhiratiś câsaṃpūrṇâdhimukticittacaryasyâpi prāyo na saṃdṛśyate |
T04sanss01u:212: na câtrêcchayā kiñcid viśeṣacihnaṃ nītârthaṃ karttuṃ labhyate |
T04sanss01u:234: yathā na te tathāgataśāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nâsti tyāgêti |
T04sanss01u:235: evam ihânyabodhicittanindā draṣṭavyā na tu bodhicittam anyathā
T04sanss01u:238: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo gotrasthaḥ sann anutpāditabodhicittaḥ tathāgatena vā tathāgataśrāvakeṇa vā saṃcodyamānaḥ saṃvedyamānaḥ samādāpyamāno 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau
T04sanss01u:241: saṃbodher vā bodhicittasya vā varṇaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvânuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ |
T04sanss01u:242: sa satvā ... naśaraṇān advīpān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya
T04sanss01u:243: yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittôtpādāya
T04sanss01u:244: sa tathāgatasya sarvâkāraparipūrṇatāṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim utpādyânuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ caturthaṃ kāraṇam iti |
T04sanss01u:245: tac ca bodhicittaṃ dvividhaṃ bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ ca bodhiprasthāna cittaṃ ca |
T04sanss01u:247: durlabhāḥ kulaputra te satvāḥ sarvaloke ye 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ praṇidadhati
T04sanss01u:248: tato 'pi durlabhatamās te satvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃprasthitêti |
T04sanss01u:250: mayā buddhena bhavitavyam iti cittaṃ praṇidhānād utpannaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss01u:253: kaḥ punar vādaḥ kiñcid eva kuśalaṃ kṛtvā |
T04sanss01u:257: tathāgato yatra nakṣatrarājena tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tāmbūlapatraṃ dattvā gopālakabhūtena |
T04sanss01u:258: evaṃ vidyutpradīpo nāma tathāgato yatra yaśasā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ daśikāṃ dattvā tantravāyabhūtena |
T04sanss01u:259: evam anantaprabho nāma tathāgato yatrârciṣmatā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tṛṇapradīpaṃ dattvā nagarâvalambakabhūtena |
T04sanss01u:260: evaṃ dṛḍhavikramo nāma tathāgato yatra duṣpradharṣeṇa tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ dattakāṣṭhaṃ dattvā kāṣṭhahārakabhūtenêty ādi ||
T04sanss01u:264: tad yathâpi nāma kulaputra cittam api vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇâlaṃkāram abhibhavati
T04sanss01u:271: itaś ca vinâpi caryayā bodhicittam upakārakam iti jñātavyaṃ |
T04sanss01u:273: yasmāc ca tvaṃ mahārāja bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ |
T04sanss01u:275: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣituṃ |
T04sanss01u:277: tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ mahārājâivam eva samyaksambodhichandaṃ śraddhāṃ tra ...
T04sanss01u:278: praṇidhiṃ ca gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi jāgrad api bhuñjāno 'pi |
T04sanss01u:282: sarvabuddhabodhisatvapratyekabuddhâryaśrāvakapṛthagjanānām ātmanaś câtītânāgatapratyutpannāni sarvakuśalamūlāny abhisaṃkṣipya tulayitvā piṇḍayitvânumodasvâgrayânumodanayā
T04sanss01u:288: tataḥ sarvasatvānāṃ yāvat sarvajñātapratilambhāya sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine dine traikālyam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayâivaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja pratipannaḥ san rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasi rājyakṛtyāni ca na hāyayiṣyasi bodhisaṃbhārāṃś ca paripūrayiṣyasîti ||
T04sanss01u:290: sa khalu punas tvaṃ mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittakuśalamūlakarmaṇo-
T04sanss01u:294: sarvāsu ca devamanuṣyôpapattiṣv ādhipatyam eva kārayasi |
T04sanss01u:295: na ca tāvat tava mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittasya
T04sanss01u:297: api ca mahārājâikam api samyaksaṃbodhicittaṃ sarvasattvôttāraṇârambaṇatvāt
T04sanss01u:304: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kim abhūmipraviṣṭhasyâpi bodhisatvasamvarâdhikāro 'sti na vêti |
T04sanss01u:307: na ca kañcit satkārāṃ kasyacit sakāśāt pratikāṃkṣaty anyatra mayâivâiṣāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ sarvôpakaraṇabāhulyam
T04sanss01u:319: śrāvakayānam evâsya na bhavati prāg eva mahāyānam iti |
T04sanss01u:326: evam ādi sūtreṣu bhūmipraviṣṭasyâpi śikṣāprajñaptir dṛśyate |
T04sanss01u:327: yatra vâsāmānyena bodhisatvam adhikṛtyôpadeśas tatrâbhyāsayogyatayā pratiṣedhavākyena vâdikarmikabodhisatvena na śikṣitavyaṃ bhaved etat |
T04sanss01u:332: na câtra śithilena bhavitavyaṃ na ca śeṣāsu na samudāgacchati |
T04sanss01u:334: ayaṃ ca saṃvaraḥ strīṇām api mṛdukleśānāṃ bodhyabhilāṣacittānāṃ labhyate |
T04sanss01u:339: iha śāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vânuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādyârabdhavīryo viharati
T04sanss01u:344: hy asya śikṣâtikrame tīvram apatrāpyaṃ guruvisaṃvādanabhayaṃ côtpadyate |
T04sanss01u:345: tatra cânābhogataḥ premagauravasiddhir ity eṣa sāmānyasaṃvaradharmaḥ |
T04sanss01u:346: atâiva bodhisatvāḥ tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ śikṣāṇām anyatamaśikṣāniṣpattikāmāḥ samādānaṃ kurvanti
T04sanss01u:347: tasya ca kalyāṇamitrasyâbhāve daśadigavasthitabuddhabodhisatvâbhimukhībhāvabhāvanayā saṃvaro grāhyaḥ saṃvaram ātmabalaṃ ca tulayitvā |
T04sanss01u:348: anyathā tu sarvabuddhabodhisatvāḥ sadevakaś ca loko visaṃvāditaḥ syāt |
T04sanss01u:349: saddharmasmṛtyupasthānasūtre hi kiñcin mātraṃ cintayitvâpy adadataḥ pretagatir uktā pratijñātaṃ câdadato narakagatiḥ |
T04sanss01u:350: kiṃ punar anuttaram artham akhilasya jagataḥ pratijñāyâsaṃpādayataḥ |
T04sanss01u:356: tatra kulaputra katamat satyaṃ yad bodhisatvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya tac cittaṃ jīvitahetor api na
T04sanss01u:359: yat punar bodhisatvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya
T04sanss01u:360: paścāt tac cittaṃ parityajati satveṣu vipratipadyate 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya pratikṛṣṭo mṛṣāvādêti
T04sanss01u:362: syād yathâpi nāma sāgaramate rājā vā rājamātro vā sarvaṃ nāgarakaṃ janaṃ śvo bhaktenôpanimantryôpekṣako bhaven nânnapānaṃ samudānayet satyaṃ sarvajanakāyaṃ visaṃvādayet |
T04sanss01u:364: evam eva sāgaramate yo bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvān āśvāsyâtīrṇatāraṇāyâmuktamocanāyânāśvastâśvāsanāya yāvan na bāhuśrutye 'bhiyogaṃ karoti nâpi tato 'nyeṣu bodhipakṣyakuśalamūleṣu dharmeṣu |
T04sanss01u:370: durlabhās te yajñasvāmino ye mahāyajñaṃ pratijñāyôttārayanti |
T04sanss01u:371: tasmāt tarhi sāgaramate na sā bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā
T04sanss01u:375: punar aparaṃ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ kenacid evâdhīṣṭo bhavati dharmeṣv arthakaraṇīyeṣu |
T04sanss01u:376: tatra bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitā bhavati yāvad ātmaparityāgo 'pi
T04sanss01u:377: bodhisatvena kartavyo bhavet tatra na punaḥ sa satvo visaṃvādayitavyêti |
T04sanss01u:378: tasmāt svabalânurūpeṇâikam api kuśalamūlaṃ samādāya rakṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanss01u:381: na punar yo 'ntaśâikam api yāvajjīvaṃ kuśalaṃ karmapathaṃ na
T04sanss01u:382: rakṣati atha ca punar evaṃ vadati |
T04sanss01u:384: sa pudgalaḥ paramakuhako mahāmṛṣāvādikaḥ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ purato visaṃvādako
T04sanss01u:385: sa mūḍhaḥ kālaṃ kurute vinipātagāmī bhavatîti |
T04sanss01u:386: yāvat kālaṃ ca śaknoti tāvat kālaṃ kuśalaṃ samādāya vartitavyaṃ ||
T04sanss01u:388: yas tu mahāsatvâivaṃ śrutvâpi bodhisatvacaryāduṣkaratām api prajñayâvagāhyôtsahatae eva sakaladuṣkhitajanaparitrāṇadhuram avavoḍhuṃ tena vandanapūjanapāpadeśanapuṇyânumodanabuddhâdhyeṣaṇayācanabodhipariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā
T04sanss01u:393: yathâryamañjuśrībuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhâlaṅkārasūtre bhagavatā mañjuśriyā pūrvajanmâvadāne caryôpetaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tathôtpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss01u:399: nimantraye jagat sarvaṃ dāridryān mocitâsmi tat ||
T04sanss01u:401: adyâgre na kariṣyāmi bodhiṃ prāpsyāmi yāvatā |
T04sanss01u:407: nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi daśa dikṣu ca viśrutaṃ |
T04sanss01u:411: na câtra sārvakālikāt saṃvaragrahaṇāj janmântarâpattiśaṅkā kartavyâtrâiva sūtre 'kṣobhyapraṇidhānânujñānād evaṃ hy uktaṃ |
T04sanss01u:415: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyur yadi sarvasyāṃ jātau na pravrajeyam iti |
T04sanss01u:417: anyās tu jātīr ābodheḥ sâiva saṃśodhayiṣyatîty ukteḥ ||
T04sanss01u:419: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasyāṃ jātau pravrajaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vâvaśyaṃ gṛhâvāsān niṣkrāmati |
T04sanss01u:421: paramo hy ayaṃ śāriputra lābho yad uta gṛhâvāsān niṣkramaṇam iti |
T04sanss01u:424: yathā janmântareṣv ayaṃ doṣo na bhavati tathâtrâiva vakṣyamāṇam ity āstāṃ tāvad etat ||
T04sanss01u:426: tad evaṃ samāttasaṃvarasya sāmānyam āpattilakṣaṇam ucyate |
T04sanss01u:427: yenâpattilakṣaṇena yuktaṃ vastu svayam apy utprekṣya pariharen na câpattipratirūpakeṣv anāpattipratirūpakeṣu ca saṃmuhyeta |
T04sanss01u:431: yadi tu tatpratyayasāmagrīṃ nânveṣate tadanantarāya pratikārāya na ghaṭate 'lpaduṣkhadaurmanasyaṃ
T04sanss01u:433: mahârthasiddhyarthaṃ câlpârthahāniṃ na karoti kṣaṇam apy upekṣate |
T04sanss01u:440: sāmānyapāpadeśanā na ... vāt tu tato muktiḥ ||
T04sanss01u:448: nirūpya yathârham atikrāmaty antaśaś caṇḍāladāsenâpi coditaḥ sâpattiko bhavati |
T04sanss01u:451: api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣi ... bhiḥ |
T04sanss01u:458: yasya kasyacin maitreyâibhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ pratibhāti pratibhāsyati vā |
T04sanss01u:459: tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā buddhasaṃjñôtpādayitavyā śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā
T04sanss01u:462: yat kiñcin maitreya subhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tad buddhabhāṣitaṃ |
T04sanss01u:463: tatra maitreya yêmāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipen nâitāni
T04sanss01u:465: teṣu câgauravam utpādayet pudgalavidveṣeṇa tena sarvabuddhabhāṣitaṃ pratibhānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss01u:468: yaḥ punar etad abhyāsârthaṃ vyutpāditam icchati |
T04sanss01u:469: tenâtra śikṣāsamuccaye tāvac caryāmukhamātraśikṣaṇârtham abhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ śikṣârambhasyâiva mahāphalatvāt |
T04sanss01u:471: yaś ca mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo buddhebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvebhyo gaṃgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vaśirājamahāmaṇiratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā dahyād evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyād |
T04sanss01u:472: yo vânyo mañjuśrīr bodhisatvêmān evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvâikântena ga-
T04sanss01u:474: tvā cittenâbhinirūpayed imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣiṣyāmîti |
T04sanss01u:475: so 'śikṣito 'pi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo 'syāṃ śikṣyāyāṃ chandiko vatataraṃ
T04sanss01u:477: na tv eva tad dānam ayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastv iti |
T04sanss01u:478: tasmād evam anuśaṃsadarśinā bodhisatvena na kathaṃcin nivarttitavyaṃ |
T04sanss01u:481: satva-s teṣām ekâikaḥ satvo rājā bhavej jambūdvīpâdhipatis te sarvae evaṃ
T04sanss01u:483: yo mahāyānam udgrahiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravarttayiṣyati tasya nakhachedena māsaṃ pañcapalikena divasenâvatārayiṣyāmaḥ taṃ câitenâpakrameṇa jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyāmêti sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvâivam ucyamāno nô trasyati na saṃtrāsam āpsyate 'ntaśâikacittôtpādenâpi na bibheti na viṣīdati na
T04sanss01u:485: uttari ca saddharmmaparigrahârtham abhiyujyate pāṭhasvâdhyāyâbhimukto viharati |
T04sanss01u:486: ayaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaś cittaśūro dānaśūraḥ śīlaśūraḥ kṣāntiśūraḥ vīryaśūraḥ dhyānaśūraḥ prajñāśūraḥ samādhiśūraḥ iti vaktavyaḥ ||
T04sanss01u:487: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaḥ teṣāṃ vadhakapuruṣāṇāṃ na kupyati na ruṣyati na khila doṣacittam utpādayati |
T04sanss01u:505: kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisatvā bodhisatvaśikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti |
T04sanss01u:507: na prātimokṣasaṃvaramātrakeṇa mayā śakyam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ |
T04sanss01u:508: kiṃ tarhi yānîmāni tathāgatena teṣu teṣu sūtrânteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā |
T04sanss01u:509: bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptāni teṣu teṣu mayā śikṣitavyam iti vistaraḥ |
T04sanss01u:510: tasmād asmadvidhena mandabuddhinā durvijñeyo vistarôktatvād bodhisatvasya saṃvaraḥ |
T04sanss01u:513: katamāni ca tāni marmasthānāni yāni hi sūtrânteṣu mahāyānâbhiratānām arthāyôktāni |
T04sanss01u:520: yo bodhisatvena mārgaḥ parigṛhītaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtena duṣkham upagāmī |
T04sanss01u:521: saced bodhisatvasya taṃ mārgaṃ parigṛhyâvasthitasyâpi kalpakoṭer atyayenâikaṃ sukhacittam utpadyetântaśo niṣadya
T04sanss01u:523: tatra bodhisatvenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ sarvasatvānām ātyayikaṃ parigṛhyâitad api me varjayan niṣīdāmîti |
T04sanss01u:527: pañcêmāni devaputrânantaryāṇi yair ānantaryaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ kṣipram anuttarāsamyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate |
T04sanss01u:531: ksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya nântarā śravakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam
T04sanss01u:534: sarvasvaparityāgitāyāṃ cittam utpādya nântarā mātsaryacittena sārddhaṃ sa nyasatîdaṃ devaputra dvitīyam
T04sanss01u:536: sarvasatvā mayā trātavyêty evaṃ cittam utpādya nântarā
T04sanss01u:538: anutpannâniruddhān sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nântarā dṛṣṭigateṣu prapatatîdaṃ devaputra caturtham ānantaryam |
T04sanss01u:539: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nântarā tiṣṭhati na viṣṭhīvati aprāptāyāṃ sarvajñatāyām idaṃ devaputra pañcamam ānantaryam iti ||
T04sanss01u:540: tasmād evam ātmabhāvabhogapuṇyānām aviratam utsargarakṣāśuddhivṛddhayo yathāyogaṃ bhāvanīyāḥ
T04sanss01u:541: tatra tāvad utsargârthaṃ parigrahadoṣabhāvanādvāreṇa vairāgyam utpādayet tyāgânuśaṃsāṃś ca bhāvayet |
T04sanss01u:543: adhyavasitā ye bālāḥ kāye 'smin pūtike samyag |
T04sanss01u:549: ye kecit satvā na bhavanti vigrahāḥ parigrahas tatra nidānamūlam |
T04sanss01u:553: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu parakīyasaṃjñām utpādayati |
T04sanss01u:560: yad dattaṃ tan na bhūyo rakṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanss01u:564: yad dattaṃ tad aparigrahaṃ yad gṛhe tat saparigrahaṃ |
T04sanss01u:565: yad dattaṃ tad abhayaṃ yad gṛhe tat sabhayam |
T04sanss01u:570: yad dattaṃ tataḥ sukham yad gṛhe tadārabhya duṣkhaṃ |
T04sanss01u:581: yāvat sacet punar asya putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpadyate
T04sanss01u:582: tathânyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ
T04sanss01u:584: samyakprayuktasya samacittasya bodhisatvasya bodhir na viṣamacittasya bodhir na mithyāprayuktasya
T04sanss01u:586: ābhis tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣya anyatre 'mitrasaṃjñôtpādayitavyâmitraṃ hy etan mama |
T04sanss01u:588: yo 'ham asyârthāya buddhaprajñaptāśikṣāyôddhuratād gatvâsmin putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpādayāmi
T04sanss01u:590: tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathâsya sarvasatveṣu putrapremânugatā maitry- utpadyate |
T04sanss01u:597: nêha saṃvidyate kaścit kasyacit ... paro vā |
T04sanss01u:599: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ
T04sanss01u:602: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanakôpasaṃkramya
T04sanss01u:606: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam avaśyaṃ mamâitena vastunā vinābhāvo bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss01u:610: etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ câinaṃ tyakṣyāmi |
T04sanss01u:611: etac ca vastu parityajyâhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati |
T04sanss01u:612: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca janayiṣyati |
T04sanss01u:613: sacet punar evam api samanvāharan śaknuyāt tad vastu parityaktum |
T04sanss01u:614: tena sa yācanakaś catasṛbhiḥ saṃjñaptibhiḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ |
T04sanss01u:624: mā paritāpsīs tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye |
T04sanss01u:626: yathâinaṃ ca tavâbhiprāyaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasatvānāṃ cêti |
T04sanss01u:630: mā bhūd bodhisatvasya tatrâprasādo bodhisatve vā yācanakasyêti |
T04sanss01u:631: na tu mātsaryam evaṃ anavadyaṃ bhavati kutsitaṃ cêdaṃ bhagavatā bodhisatvānāṃ ||
T04sanss01u:633: catvārême śāriputra dharmā bodhisatvānāṃ na saṃvidyante |
T04sanss01u:640: yasyême śāriputra catvāro dharmāḥ saṃvidyante sa
T04sanss01u:645: saṃkleśadharmo vatâyaṃ lokâmiṣaguruko vatâyaṃ bhaktacoḍakaparamo vatâyam iti |
T04sanss01u:646: tathā cittaśūrāḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvā bhavanti |
T04sanss01u:668: na sa parigrahaḥ parigrahītavyo yasmin parigrahe nôtsarjanacittam
T04sanss01u:669: utpādayen na sa parivārôpādātavyo yasmin yācanakair yācyamānasya
T04sanss01u:671: na tad rājyam upādātavyaṃ na te bhogā na tad ratnam upādātavyaṃ yāvan na tat kiñcid vastûpādātavyaṃ
T04sanss01u:673: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss01u:675: prāg eva bāhyāni vastūni yasya yasya satvasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai tad dāsyāmi satsaṃvidyamānaṃ hastaṃ hastârthikebhyo dāsyāmi pādaṃ pādârthikebhyo netraṃ netrârthikebhyo dāsyāmi |
T04sanss01u:676: māṃsaṃ māṃsârthikebhyaḥ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitârthikebhyo majjānaṃ majjârthikebhyo
T04sanss01u:679: kaḥ punar vādo bāhyeṣu vastuṣu yad uta dhanadhānyajātarūparajataratnâbharaṇahayagajarathavāhanagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīpattanadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaputraduhitṛparivāreṣu api tu khalu punar yasya yasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai satvāya tat tad deyaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ dāsyāmi |
T04sanss01u:681: anapekṣo dāsyāmi satvânugrahāya satvakāruṇyena satvânukampayā teṣām eva satvānāṃ saṃgrahāya
T04sanss01u:686: tad yathâpi nāma kula-putra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā
T04sanss01u:687: hriyamāṇasya gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ tvaktaḥ patrato vā hriyamāṇasya puṣpataḥ phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya nâivaṃ bhavati vikalpo |
T04sanss01u:688: mūlato me hriyate yāvat sārato me hriyatae iti ||
T04sanss01u:689: api tu khalu punar avikalpâiva hīnamadhyôtkṛṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ vyādhīn apanayati |
T04sanss01u:690: evam eva kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenâsmiṃś cāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñôtpādayitavyā
T04sanss01u:691: yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ satvānāṃ yena yenârthaḥ tat tad eva me harantu hastaṃ hastârthinaḥ pādaṃ pādârthinêti pūrvavat ||
T04sanss01u:693: ayam eva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu kṣapayitavyaḥ |
T04sanss01u:694: tad yathâpi nāmêmāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātuś ca
T04sanss01u:696: nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānârambaṇair nānôpakaraṇair nānāparibhogaiḥ satvānāṃ nānôpabhogaṃ gacchanti |
T04sanss01u:697: evam evâham imaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānârambaṇair nānôpakaraṇair nānāparibhogair vistareṇa sarvasatvānām upabhogyaṃ kariṣyāmîti |
T04sanss01u:698: sêmam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan kāyaduṣkhatāṃ ca pratyavekṣate kāyaduṣkhatayā ca na parikhidyate satvâvekṣayêti ||
T04sanss01u:700: iti hi bodhisatvâtmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niryātayan sarvakuśalamūlôpakāritvena sarvasatvānāṃ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvā-
T04sanss01u:702: haran pradīpasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣûpanayan sukhasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣv adhitiṣṭhan
T04sanss01u:703: dharmakukṣisamam ātmānaṃ sarvajagati saṃdhārayan ālokasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣv anugacchan jagatpratiṣṭhāpanasamam ātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan |
T04sanss01u:706: ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃdarśayamānaḥ anuttarasukhôpadhānasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu pariśodhamānaḥ
T04sanss01u:709: yathākāmakaraṇīyavaśyam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃpaśyann agracaityā bhaviṣyāmaḥ ... sarvajagatsthityātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan |
T04sanss01u:713: sarvajagato dānapatim ātmānam adhimucyamānaḥ sarvalokajñānasamam ātmānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ bodhisatvacaryāprayuktam ātmānaṃ saṃjanayamānaḥ |
T04sanss01u:719: dhisatvatyāgacittatāṃ manasi kurvāṇôdyānabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃpaśyan |
T04sanss01u:723: anantaprītisaṃjananam ātmānaṃ sarvajagato niryātayamānaḥ sarvaśukladharmāya dvārabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃdhārayamānaḥ |
T04sanss01u:728: iti hi bodhisatvâtmānam upasthāyakatvāya dadānaḥ yācanakeṣu nīcamanasikāracitto bhūmyâstaraṇâdhiṣṭhānacetā
T04sanss01u:730: sarvasatvôpasthānâklāntamānasaprayukto bālajanaduṣkṛtasthiraḥ sthāvarâdhivāsanajātyaḥ asthitaḥ kuśalamūlâbhiyuktaḥ aprayuktasarvalokadhātûpasthānaḥ karṇo nāsā saṃparityajan
T04sanss01u:735: asārāc charīrāt sārâdānâbhiprāyêti hi bodhisatvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno ma ... vātā premaṇīyayā
T04sanss01u:736: maitryôpacāravitatayā bhadre siṃhâsane rājârhe niṣādya taṃ yācanakam abhibhāṣate dṛṣṭaḥ |
T04sanss01u:740: 'nadhyavasitaśarīracitto 'nabhiniviṣṭavacanacitto jānumaṇḍalapraṣṭhitakāyo bhūtvā svakān mukhāj jihvā ... yācanakasya sarvaśarīram
T04sanss01u:741: adhīnaṃ kṛtvā vācaṃ pramuñcan snigdhāṃ mṛdvīṃ premaṇīyāṃ maitryôpacārāṃ |
T04sanss01u:742: gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mama jihvāṃ yathā kāmakaraṇīyāṃ kuru |
T04sanss01u:743: tathā kuru yathā tvaṃ prīto bhavasi
T04sanss01u:745: prītamānasâtmanā pramudito hṛṣṭaḥ prītisaumanasyajātêti sa śiraḥ parityajan sarvadharmâgraśiraḥ paramajñānam avataran sarvasatvaparitrāṇa śirobodhi ... gacchan sarvajagadagryaśiraḥ anupamajñānam abhilaṣan sarvadikchiraḥ prāptuṃ jñānarājam
T04sanss01u:748: iti hi bodhisatvo hastapādān parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ śraddhāhastaprayuktenânugraha cāritreṇa bodhisatvasiṃhavikramatyāgapratatapāṇinā vyavasargâbhiratena hastapādaparityāgena mahāpratiṣṭhānakramatalavyatihāreṇa bodhisatvacaryâdhyavasāyena vedanânupahatatayā dānaprasādaśaktyā vimalacittôtpādasaṃvaro niṣparyavasthānajñā-
T04sanss01u:751: sarvabodhisatvasaṃvarṇitâikatyāganiryāṇêti hi bodhisatvaḥ svaśarīram ākṣipya rudhiram anuprayacchan yācanakebhyaḥ praharṣitabodhicitto |
T04sanss01u:754: prītiprasrabdhyā svaśarīrânapekṣacittaḥ svaśarīrād rudhiram anuprayacchan jñānâyatanamahāyānaprasṛtacetā mahāyānâvinaṣṭamanêṣṭamanās tuṣṭamanāḥ prītamanāḥ muditamanā maitry-manāḥ sukhamanāḥ prasannamanāḥ pramuditaprītisaumanasyajāto majjāmāṃsaṃ svaśarīrāt parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ kalyāṇatyāgayā yācakâbhilaṣitayā vācā tān yācakān abhilapan |
T04sanss01u:755: gṛhṇantu bhavanto mama śarīrān majjāmāṃsaṃ yathā kāmakaruṇāyā tulyaprītivivarddhanena tyāgacittena
T04sanss01u:760: apratyavekṣitena karmavipākapratyayena sarvalokadhātvavimukhayā sarvabuddhakṣetrâlaṃkāravyūhapūjayā sarvajagadabhimukhayā karuṇāparitrāṇatayā |
T04sanss01u:770: sarvajagatparipācananidānaṃ mahāpraṇidhānaṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ saṃvasamānaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃbhāraṃ saṃbharamāṇaḥ praṇidhim ariñcan so 'tra yakṛtbukkāphupphuṣaṃ yācakebhyaḥ parityajan
T04sanss01u:771: yācanakâbhiprasannayā dṛṣṭyā prasannaprītyākārair netrair bodhisatvaniryātena premṇâvyutthitamanasikāreṇa tyāgenâsārāt kāyāt supratyavekṣitena sārâdānacittena śmaśānaparyantena kāyânusmṛtimanasikāreṇa vṛkaśṛgālaśvabhakṣyaṃ śarīraṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ parabhaktimanasikṛtayā |
T04sanss01u:772: śarīrânityatayâpaviddhaśarīreṇa parabhaktacetanena evaṃ dharmamanasikāraprayukto bodhisatvas tān yācanakān animiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇâivaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss01u:773: yadi câham etadyācanakasyâitaccharīrād antraṃ yakṛtbukkāphuṣphuṣaṃ dadyāṃ
T04sanss01u:780: sâivaṃ manasikārasaṃtoṣitena santānenâivaṃ dharmajñānenâśayena kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñâdhiṣṭhitena yācanakadarśanenâsārāt kāyāt sāram ādātukāmo dharmakāmatayā svamāṃsān nakhaṃ parityajann eva tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayatîty
T04sanss01u:783: iti hi bodhisatvo nānādakṣiṇīyapratigrāhakeṣv anyânyapudgaladigāgateṣv aprameyakṛpaṇavanīpakeṣu bodhisatvaśravâgateṣu bodhisatvaśabdaṃ śrutvâgateṣu bodhisatvapratyayâvakāśagateṣu bodhisatvadānapūrvaṃ praṇidhānaśruteṣu |
T04sanss01u:786: mayâiva tatra diśaṃ gatvā yūyaṃ pratimānayitavyâbhaviṣyata yena yuṣmākam āgamanaklamo na syāt
T04sanss01u:787: evaṃ samṛddhapraṇipātena kṣamayati sarvayācanakān kṣamayitvā snāpayitvā viśrāmitaśarīrān kṛtvā tebhyo yadṛcchayôpakaraṇaṃ pratipādayati
T04sanss01u:788: yad idaṃ maṇirathān jambudvīpakalyāṇakanyāratnaparipūrṇān yad idaṃ suvarṇarathān janapadaviśuddhakanyāratnaparipūrṇān
T04sanss01u:791: tathâtrâiva deśitaṃ maṇirathān vā dadānaḥ sarvaratnajālasaṃchannān ājāneyahastyupetān |
T04sanss01u:794: candanarathān dadāno ratnacakrarathyaprayuktān ratnasiṃhâsanapratiṣṭhitān yāvan nānāratnachatrasaṃchannavyūhān ratnavitānavitatasaṃchannān dhvajapatākâlaṃkṛtacaturdi-
T04sanss01u:801: ātmānaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayann upasthānaṃ vā sarvabuddhānām upādadāno rājyaṃ vā parityajan paṭabhedakaṃ vā nagararājadhānīṃ sarvâlaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ yathârhaṃ vā yācanakeṣu sarvaparivāraṃ parityajan putraduhitṛbhāryāṃ vā dadāno yācanakebhyaḥ sarvagṛhaṃ vâpasṛjan |
T04sanss01u:803: evaṃ pānadānaṃ rasadānam api bodhisatvo dadāno vividhān kalyāṇān udārān viśuddhān avikalāṃs tiktāṃl lavaṇān kaṭakān kaṣāyān nānārasâgrôpetān susnigdhān
T04sanss01u:808: evaṃ vastradānaṃ puṣpadānaṃ gandhadānaṃ vilepanadānaṃ mālyadānaṃ |
T04sanss01u:823: iti hi bodhisatvo hastyājāneyān dadānaḥ saptâṅgasupratiṣṭhitān |
T04sanss01u:832: sa tān dadānaḥ parityajan gauraveṇa gurujanebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitramātāpitṛbhyaḥ kṛpaṇavanīpakayācanakebhyaḥ sarvajagatpratigrāhakabhyo muktacittayā dadāno |
T04sanss01u:835: dhisatvaguneṣu pratipadyamāno 'bhijātabodhisatvâdhyāśayān pariśodhayamāno yāvad iti hi bodhisatvâsanadānaṃ dadānaḥ parityajan rājabhadrâsanāni
T04sanss01u:840: evaṃ yāvad iti hi bodhisatvaś chatrāṇi dadānaḥ parityajan mahāratnavyūhapratimaṇḍitāni ratnadaṇḍāni kiṅkiṇījālasaṃchannāni |
T04sanss01u:847: tādṛśānāṃ chatrāṇām anekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrâlaṃkārāṇāṃ tadatiriktāni câsaṃkhyeyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrâlaṃkārāṇy anapekṣacitto dadānaḥ parityajann avasṛjann anuprayacchan saṃmukhībhūtebhyo vā satvasārebhyo nirvṛtānāṃ vā tathāgatānāṃ caityâlaṃkārāya |
T04sanss01u:850: bhyo vâbhijātabodhisatvadharmabhāṇakebhyo vā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vā saṃgharatne vā sarvabuddhaśāsane vā yāvat sarvapratigrāhakebhyaḥ sâivaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati ||
T04sanss01u:851: yathā tāvat prathamāyām eva pariṇāmanāyāṃ sarvakuśalamūlaprastāveṣûpadiṣṭaṃ |
T04sanss01u:853: katham etāni kuśalamūlāni sarvajagadupajīvyāny upakāribhūtāni bhaveyur viśuddhadharmaparyavasānāni yena sarvasatvānām etaiḥ
T04sanss01u:856: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayann evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati |
T04sanss01u:857: anenâhaṃ kuśalamūlena sarvasatvānāṃ nayanaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvaduṣkhaskandhavinivarttanāya |
T04sanss01u:880: idaṃ mama kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ gativiśuddhaye saṃvarteta |
T04sanss01u:890: anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasatvāḥ sarvabuddhān ārāgayeyur ārāgayitvā ca mā virāgayeyuḥ
T04sanss01u:891: teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu prasādam abhedyaṃ pratilabheran |
T04sanss01u:892: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ |
T04sanss01u:899: mahatsu ca kuśalamūleṣv ātmānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur atyantaṃ ca dāridryaṃ vinivarttayeyuḥ sapta dhanapratilambhāṃś ca paripūrayeyuḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ cânuśikṣayeyuḥ kalyāṇêndriyapratilambhaṃ câdhigaccheyuḥ |
T04sanss01u:911: yena ca sukhôpadhānena sarvabuddhāḥ samanvāgatās tatsukhôpadhānapratilabdhāḥ sarvasatvā bhaveyur iti ||
T04sanss01u:919: sarvasatvāḥ sarvarasâgrajihvā bhavantu rasanimittā grahītāraḥ sarvabuddhadharmacittanaprayuktāḥ
T04sanss01u:937: sarvasatvā bodhisatvapariṇāmanāvāsitā bhavantu sarvasatvāḥ sarvaśukladharmavāsitā bhavantu sarvâkuśaladharmaprahīṇāḥ |
T04sanss01u:948: sarvasatvânantâlokā bhavantu sarvabuddhadharmeṣu sarvasatvâpratihatâvabhāsā bhavantu sarvadharmadhātvekaspharaṇāḥ
T04sanss01u:975: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvāḥ kalyāṇamitrâtyāgacittânutsṛṣṭā bhavantu kṛtajñāḥ kṛtânupālanatayā
T04sanss01u:990: mā bhūt tan mama kuśalamūlaṃ dharmajñānakauśalyaṃ vā yan na
T04sanss01u:993: kuśalānāṃ ca cittacaitasikānānām anusmṛtir anusmṛtya ca bodhipariṇāmanā |
T04sanss01u:996: ye me utpatsyante kuśalāś cittôtpādās tān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
